text: Gonzalo Álvarez Chillida (born 1958) is a Spanish historian. He has been referred to as the leading Spanish expert in the study of antisemitism in Spain. == Biography == Born in 1958 in San Sebastián. He earned a PhD at the Autonomous University of Madrid (UAM). —his dissertation was titled José María Pemán: un contrarrevolucionario en la crisis española del siglo XX.
